CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Research & Development relative to Engineering Department?
SRP.A: Research & Development is {above} Engineering Department in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total absenteeism rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Engineering Department}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total absenteeism rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Research & Development}.

VE.Q: What is Research & Development's Absenteeism Rate in 1991?
VE.A: Research & Development's absenteeism rate in 1991 is {4.01} %.

VE.Q: What is Research & Development's Absenteeism Rate in 2003?
VE.A: Research & Development's absenteeism rate in 2003 is {1.08} %.

VE.Q: What is Research & Development's Absenteeism Rate in 2004?
VE.A: Research & Development's absenteeism rate in 2004 is {0.90} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Absenteeism Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum absenteeism rate is {0.90} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Absenteeism Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum absenteeism rate is {8.18} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Absenteeism Rate level recorded for Engineering Department?
What is the lowest Absenteeism Rate level recorded for Engineering Department?
EVJ.A: Engineering Department's lowest recorded level is approximately {3.92} % in {1991}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Absenteeism Rate?
SC.A: The average total absenteeism rate is {8.49} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Absenteeism Rate fall between 8.06 and 8.90 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Absenteeism Rate go below 8.19 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Absenteeism Rate exceed 8.77 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Absenteeism Rate in 1994 higher or lower than in 2003?
NC.A: The total absenteeism rate in 1994 was {lower} than in 2003.

NC.Q: Was the total Absenteeism Rate in 1996 higher or lower than in 2004?
NC.A: The total absenteeism rate in 1996 was {lower} than in 2004.

NC.Q: Between 1993 and 1994, did the total Absenteeism Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1995 and 2004?
NC.A: The change in total absenteeism rate between 1993 and 1994 was {smaller} than between 1995 and 2004.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 1999, was the average total Absenteeism Rate higher or lower than between 1998 and 2000?
NC.A: The average total absenteeism rate between 1991 and 1999 was {lower} than between 1998 and 2000.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Engineering Department} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Research & Development, Engineering Department}.
